traits.label: ratio
traits.name: :ratio
traits.desc: Aspect ratio for the content; If value is a String, then avoid using a computational statement (like '16/9') and instead specify the String value of the result directly (eg. '1.7777')

traits.label: src
traits.name: :src
traits.desc: The source url to display in an iframe

traits.label: title
traits.name: :title
traits.desc: (Accessibility) Set the native 'title' attribute value of the inner iframe being used

traits.label: fetchpriority
traits.name: :fetchpriority
traits.desc: Provides a hint of the relative priority to use when fetching the iframe document

traits.label: loading
traits.name: :loading
traits.desc: Indicates how the browser should load the iframe

traits.label: referrerpolicy
traits.name: :referrerpolicy
traits.desc: Indicates which referrer to send when fetching the frame's resource
